query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, type, SUM(CAST(amount AS DECIMAL(20,2))) as total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY type;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user hMaZ9xp2zKPPmiL.root --database nmnc2rhS5H7jfGAqB8XvCi --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total, type, SUM(CAST(amount AS DECIMAL(20,2))) as total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY type;
